db:abstract.db:para: The QWheelEvent class contains parameters that describe a mouse wheel event.
This class was introduced in Qt 5.5.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Mouse wheel events occur when the mouse is rotated.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QWheelEvent::QWheelEvent(const QWheelEvent &e)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a new QWheelEvent instance from the QWheelEvent e.

db:section.db:title: QPoint QWheelEvent::angleDelta() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the distance that the wheel is rotated, in eighths of a degree. A positive value indicates that the wheel was rotated forward (away from the user), a negative value indicates the wheel was rotated backward (toward the user).

db:section.db:title: int QWheelEvent::buttons() const
db:section.db:para: Returns a bitfield to be used to check for mouse buttons that may be accompanying the wheel event.

db:section.db:title: bool QWheelEvent::isAccepted() const
db:section.db:para: Returns whether the event was accepted.

db:section.db:title: Qt3DInput::QWheelEvent::Modifiers QWheelEvent::modifier() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the keyboard modifier that may be accompanying the wheel event.

db:section.db:title: void QWheelEvent::setAccepted(bool accepted)
db:section.db:para: Sets the event as accepted if accepted is true.

db:note.db:para: When an event is accepted, it will prevent further propagation to other listeners.

db:section.db:title: QEvent::Type QWheelEvent::type() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the QEvent::Type of the event.

db:section.db:title: int QWheelEvent::x() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the x position of the mouse event.

db:section.db:title: int QWheelEvent::y() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the x position of the mouse event.
